tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_prescription_trends (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  prescription_date DATE,
  prescribing_physician VARCHAR(255),
  intervention_policy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prescription_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name TEXT,
  prescription_date DATE,
  prescription_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE medication_prescriptions (
    prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    prescription_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE prescription_doctors (
    prescription_id UUID,
    doctor_id UUID,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
    specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_interventions (
    intervention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    intervention_description TEXT,
    intervention_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE medication_prescriptions (
  prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  medication_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  dosage FLOAT NOT NULL,
  prescription_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
  gender TEXT NOT NULL,
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_interventions (
  intervention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  intervention_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE prescription_history (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  prescription_id UUID NOT NULL,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  intervention_id UUID NOT NULL,
  history_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
	prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255),
	prescription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(255),
	patient_age INT,
	patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
	address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
	doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
	doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
	hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
	location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
	medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255),
	manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
	purpose VARCHAR(255),
	side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interventions (
	intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
	intervention_description TEXT,
	intervention_date DATE,
	policy_effectiveness VARCHAR(255)
);
